CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1969, page 9 reads: "Black and White Together - The Black Monday demonstration for jobs in Pittsburgh drew people from all segments of the community. As the above picture clearly shows many whites took part in march showing their approval of the fight to open up jobs in the craft unions."
TitMainTitle: Black Construction Coalition Black Monday demonstration with protesters marching past US Steel building, Downtown Pittsburgh
